name: appssemble
description:
We appssemble business-critical mobile solutions for small and large companies. We help you turn concepts into reliable and robust mobile solutions, with concrete strategy and dazzling design. When we release a new app into the real world, we want to see it fly the nest and thrive, that is why we are using frameworks and platforms you can trust, built by a partner you can rely on.
We offer a large variaty of services that cover all the spectrum of mobile applications. We are collaborating with well established companies as well as with businesses which just start out. We treat every project like it's our first, with the same passion, curiosity and love to forge, however we are not beginners and our youth enthusiasm is seasoned with over 10 years of experience in the mobile industry.
READ MORE...
